vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.18;
son of: Mered (H4778)(?) and Jehudijah (H3057);
brother of: Jered (H3382H) and Heber (H2268I);
half-brother of: Miriam (H4813H), Shammai (H8060I) and Ishbah (H3431)
§ Jekuthiel = "cleansing of God"
a descendant of Caleb of the tribe of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: fundador de Zanóah; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶古鐵 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "神的保存(?)"
猶大的後裔 (代上 4:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶古铁 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "神的保存(?)"
犹大的后裔 (代上 4:17)
